Armand Boua (a mụrụ n'afọ 1978) bụ onye Ivory Coast na-ese ihe. A maara Boua maka usoro ya nke eserese na katụụn na acrylic paint na tar, wee kpochapụ eserese iji mepụta oghere na-adịghị mma.
A mụrụ Boua na Abijan. Boua gụrụ akwụkwọ na National School of Fine Arts na Technical Center of Applied Arts, ha niile na Abidjan.
A gụnyere ọrụ ya na nchịkọta nke Minneapolis Institute of Art.
